pullRequest.title: implement history API endpoint
pullRequest.bodyText: This change adds the API endpoint for history. It supports pagination and history for directories.

nodes.bodyText: nb, looks like a task for streaming api

can you assert something more - contanins some string, minimal length?
it relies on the serialization and when it's broken you wouldn't catch it.

commit.message:
Revert "remove HistoryDTO class"

This reverts commit c2bf3711bd210d4a3c6ee39fe712a97cfa6676b2.
return of HistoryDTO, augmented with counters
